title: Play FreeCell Online – Free Card Game | No Download, Just Fun
description: Enjoy FreeCell, the classic solitaire card game, directly in your browser. Free to play, no downloads required, mobile-friendly, and safe for all ages. Master strategy, challenge yourself, and have fun online today!
subtitle: A classic solitaire card game
howToPlaySteps: Move all cards to the foundation piles.
Use free cells to temporarily hold cards.
Build tableau columns in descending order and alternating colors.
